Html:
I knew the project today. It's great, made ​​me deeply happy with humanity. I downloaded the source and when I do the build I get the following message:
"Error 4 Unexpected error writing metadata to file 'C:\Dados\.....\GMap.NET.WindowsForms.dll' -- 'Error signing assembly -- Access Denied ' GMap.NET.WindowsForms"
Already have disabled the Hot build. I Never worked with assembly signing and my english is ugly like my face. Sorry.
Any help or indication of document will be useful.

I discovered that I need to be administrator on the machine. But, I don't know why... Being machine administrator, all works fine. Otherwise, I have the above message. I'm looking for the problem, and write so find. I will try disable signing.
